author: jleroux
msg: "Gift card reload service not working OOTB" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5914
Introduces inventory data for GC-002 to have the amount field showing at ecommerce/gift-card-reload-GC-002-p. This field depends on ProductFacility.lastInventoryCount column
